sense.def:
To seek something
pomeni poskušati nekaj najti in si tisto zagotoviti.

seg.quote: Thousands of people were seeking food and shelter.
I was seeking the help of someone who spoke French.
Books are eagerly sought for and sold on the streets.

sense.def:
To seek to do something
pomeni poskušati tisto narediti.

seg.quote: Power stations are seeking to reduce their use of oil.

sense.def:
To seek out someone or something
pomeni nekoga ali nekaj iskati toliko časa, dokler tistega ne najdemo.
